sourcesContent:
import "./ModalRecipe.css"; import { Modal, Row, Col, Container, Button, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import React, {useState, useEffect } from "react"; import configData from "../../config.json"; function MydModalWithGrid(props) { const [ heartActive, setHeartState ] = useState(false); const [Receta, setReceta] = useState([]); /* useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`./json/id/${props.id}.json`) .then((response)=>response.json()) .then((data)=>setReceta(data)); },[]); */ /* if (props.ingredients) { console.log(Receta);+ } */ useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`${configData.SERVER_URL}/recetas/${id}`) .then((response)=>response.json()) .then((data)=>setReceta(data)); },[]); return ( {Receta.name} setHeartState(!heartActive)} id="heart">
Ingredientes
Banano
Fresa
Mora
Yogurt Griego
Granola
Semillas de chía
Preperación: {Receta.preparation}
{Receta.calories}
Calorías
{Receta.proteins}
Proteínas
{Receta.carbohidrates}
Carbs
{Receta.fats}g
Grasas
Dificultad: {Receta.difficulty}
Tiempo: {Receta.makingTime}
 ); } export default MydModalWithGrid;
